column5: Anyone ever fish Action Lake with Showatler's? I'm looking for any information you might have the time to share. I've checked the search engine and not coming up with a whole lot. thanks in advance for any help.
Hello,I am heading to Action Lake in a couple of weeks. Any info on the lake/camp would be great! Also, first time driving across the border. Can anyone let me know what to expect?Thanks!Alan

Bruce - I sent you a PM. I know guys that have been here that can help you out. I have been to several of Showalter's lakes but not Action. I do have this lake booked for next year - first week of June.
Check out this site. It has a ton of info on crossing the border. http://www.ezbordercrossing.com/ Also do a search on this forum . There's a ton of info on border crossing.
